betterquesting:10.desc:8:
Coke Ovens are a multiblock structure used to turn logs/coal into charcoal/coke coal and produce creosote.

You construct them as a 3x3 cube with an empty middle block, using 26 blocks.

Unless you have excess clay lying around these aren't all that worth it unless you want creosote for rails now. Though it is worth noting that since they don't require fuel or power they are the most efficient method of getting creosote, charcoal, and coke coal.
